column2: "It might be just me, but did it just get colder in here?"
"I also feel cold for some reason... no, more like... scared?"
"...! Get back!"
"T- Techniques!? W-Who is that?!"
"Who? You don't even need to ask. Those who destroy anyone who dares invade the Mothership... the strongest guards."
"Of course, that's only appropriate for the strongest of all ARKS..."
"T- That's..."
"Whaaa?!"
"Oi oi, aren't you happy that we've met after a long time? That was quite the violent greeting, wasn't it?"
"Huh, Claris Claes?"
"Casra..."
"Well, well, isn't it Echo. It has been a while."
"If I may ask, the person next to you is an enemy of the ARKS... Why haven't you killed them?"
"This person is my student... Defending their student, that's what a teacher does."
"...Long time no see, Maria."
"...I didn't want to meet like this if I could help it, Regius."
"I knew you were stubborn, but I didn't think you were this inflexible."
"Being on their side... Can I take that as you intending to side with the enemy?"
"Take it however you wish. We Six don't cooperate. You of all people should know this the best."
"Then in that case, there is no more need for words."
"To destroy those that mean to harm the ARKS... That is the duty of the Three Heroes."
"Don't be so conceited. That's why us \"even numbers\" are here."
"Your quest progress has been saved."
